parameters.query: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.english_title, p.sku, p.purchase_price, p.cost_price, p.weight_g, p.hts_code, p.origin_country, p.ebay_category_id, p.sm_lowest_price, p.sm_average_price, p.ebay_api_data, p.listing_data, p.sm_selected_item, p.condition, p.workflow_status, COALESCE(p.manual_override, '{}'::jsonb) as manual_override, p.ai_confidence_score, p.user_id, p.updated_at FROM products_master p WHERE p.workflow_status = 'enrich' AND p.user_id = $1 ORDER BY p.updated_at DESC LIMIT $2

parameters.jsCode: return [{ json: { success: true, processed: 0, message: 'è£œå®Œå¾…ã¡å•†å“ãªã—' } }];

parameters.query: SELECT gs.key, gs.value FROM global_settings gs WHERE gs.user_id = $1 AND gs.key IN ('exchange_rate_usd_jpy', 'target_margin', 'fvf_rate', 'min_margin', 'ddp_service_fee')

SELECT hts_code, hts_prefix, product_type, category_keywords, ebay_category_ids, base_tariff_rate, section_301_applicable, section_301_rate, description_ja, confidence_level FROM hts_rates WHERE hts_code != '9999.99.99' ORDER BY confidence_level = 'high' DESC, product_type LIMIT 500

parameters.jsCode:
const p = $input.first().json;
return [{ json: { ...p, ai_skipped: true, confidence_score: p.final_hts.confidence || 100, enrichment_source: p.final_hts.source || 'manual_entry' } }];

parameters.query: UPDATE products_master SET hts_code = COALESCE(NULLIF($1, ''), hts_code), origin_country = COALESCE(NULLIF($2, ''), origin_country), weight_g = $3, listing_data = COALESCE(listing_data, '{}'::jsonb) || '{{ JSON.stringify({ is: $json.item_specifics, hs: $json.hts_source }).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb, ddp_price_usd = $4, price_usd = $5, shipping_cost_usd = $6, profit_usd = $7, profit_margin = $8, profit_jpy = $9, workflow_status = $10, ai_confidence_score = $11, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $12 AND user_id = $13 AND updated_at = $14 RETURNING id, sku, workflow_status
DELETE FROM ai_enrichment_logs WHERE created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
